Name: [Research] Trigger Instinct
Desc: For every 1% of HP lost, Agent DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>1%</color>. (Current increase: Please see Resonium Details. Maximum increase: 80%)
Desc2:
An exquisitely designed badge.
A special Resonium issued by the White Star Institute to Investigators of Hollow Zero, for research on survival instinct-related matters.
